results.text: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
results.reason: This verse reassures us of God's constant presence and support, countering feelings of loneliness.
results.reflection: In moments of loneliness, God's promise to be with us can be our greatest comfort.

results.text: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me; your rod and your staff, they comfort me.
results.reason: The psalm speaks of God's companionship even in the darkest times, alleviating loneliness.
results.reflection: God's presence transforms our darkest valleys into places of comfort and peace.

results.text: God sets the lonely in families, he leads out the prisoners with singing; but the rebellious live in a sun-scorched land.
results.reason: This verse speaks to God's ability to provide community and belonging for the lonely.
results.reflection: God's love can create a sense of family and belonging even in solitude.
